profile:
The Roofing Crew is Dedicated to Bringing You The Best In Quality and Value for Your Roof. 

"Your Roof, Our Responsibility"

Since 2010, THE ROOFING CREW is a locally owned and operated, fully licensed and insured roofing company in Hamilton, Ontario. We are the areas #1 roofing contractor specializing in residential roofing repair and replacement, commercial roofing, construction and more. Our team is made up of sincere, genuine, and quality-minded roofing experts with the skill and experience to get the job done right the first time, with outstanding customer service and quality roofing products at reasonable prices.

Covid-19 Safety Protocols in Place
